name: Duskless: The Clockwork Army
detailed_description:
Rise up against robot troops that are crushing the kingdom you love in this thrilling match-three steampunk adventure!

Follow the gripping story of Hiro, chief inventor of King William and Etherpoint City, as he devises the means to protect his home from the destructive machines of his predecessor, Professor Bazel. The professor grew jealous as Hiro gained the king's favor and swore to claim Etherpoint for himself.

Use your matching skills to complete tasks in Timed or Relaxed mode. Upgrade bonuses like the Hammer and the Lightning Gun to improve your chances of success. And exterminate spiders and other deadly enemies in your quest to defeat Bazel.

Can you stop the onslaught and restore Etherpoint City to its former glory?

Upsell features:

• Gripping story
• Exciting match-three action
• Gorgeous steampunk-inspired visuals
• Five captivating chapters
• Timed and Relaxed modes

short_description: Rise up against robot troops that are crushing the kingdom you love in this thrilling match-three steampunk adventure! Can you stop the onslaught and restore Etherpoint City to its former glory?
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB 3D video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A screen resolution of 1024x768 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3 GHZ processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB 3D video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A screen resolution of 1024x768 or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB 3D video card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1024х768
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 or later
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB 3D video card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1024х768
